mapper.select: select * from user_channel where member_code = #{member_code} and channel_code = #{member_last_channel}
mapper.insert: insert into video_play values (${video_code}, ${channel_code}, ${channel_name}, ${video_title}, ${vidio_cont}, ${video_cont}, ${video_img}, default, default, default, ${video_hash}, sysdate, ${video_open}, ${category_cdoe})
